job.title: Software Engineer Intern (Campus 2021-2022)
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrstrongAt Cvent our paid technology internships are designed to provide students with realworld mentorship and experience Interns are exposed to the inner workings of an industryleading software company and are expected to take ownership of projects to contribute to the companys continued success Projects are assigned based on current production schedules and operations needs allowing for extensive exposure to the components and cycles of the technology department Cvents internships are ideally structured to not only support professional development but also open the doors to full time employment with the company upon graduationbrulliWork on large scale cloudbased applications where performance reliability and scalability are critical design goalsliliGain experience with different database technologies ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL productsliliWork in a collaborative teambased environment in an Agile environmentliliIdentify and resolve issues related to customer experienceliliAnalyze the functionality of our webbased software platforms mobile devices and backend systemsbrliulstronguWhat You Need For This PositionbrustrongulliRising Senior graduating in December 2022 or May 2023 liliPursuing bachelors degree in computer science or other technology successful candidate will be passionate about technology Keeping up with the latest advancements in the industry spending time creating building and exploring with technical projects an inquisitive attitude in regard to the workings of hardware and software and overall simply having fun and finding enjoyment in the fieldbrbrAt Cvent we celebrate support and are committed to creating a diverse
